title: Please.. could someone help me with this font?
author: cosagrafica

comments.content: It must be **[Skia](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014205943/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Apple&ffam=Skia%20-%20Regular&fid=dc93555ed379e1547d3f0b9b1450c337&fstyle=b&fsize=60&text=viajes&wrap=2)** by Matthew Carter, David Berlow (published by Apple) probably artificially emboldened
